input.sentences: the band getting ready for the school concert .
the whole band tuning up during rehearsal .
everyone filing in for the big school concert .
standing ovation after the big performance .

output.sentences: We got ready for the school concert.
The band tuned up and rehearsed.
Everyone filled the room for the concert.
The band got a standing ovation.
Afterwards the guys picked up the chairs.
